```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(tinduck)
```

```{r}
data("example_data")

df <- example_data
timepoint_col <- "timepoint"
item_col <- "item"
value_col <- "value"

```

# {.tabset .tabset-pills}

## Line chart, value

```{r}
prepare_table(
  df,
  timepoint_col,
  item_col,
  value_col
  ) %>%
  output_table_html(
    item_label = "item",
    history_style = "line"
  )
  
```

## Bar chart, delta

```{r}
prepare_table(
  df,
  timepoint_col,
  item_col,
  value_col,
  history_type = "delta"
  ) %>%
  output_table_html(
    item_label = "item",
    history_style = "bar"
  )
  
```

## tabs rmd loop {.tabset}

```{r}
dfgroups <- df %>%
  dplyr::mutate(group = dplyr::case_when(grepl("norm", item) ~ "norm",
                                         grepl("sparse", item) ~ "sparse",
                                         TRUE ~ "other"))
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
tab_names <- unique(dfgroups$group)

for (i in seq_along(tab_names)) {

    cat("\n###", tab_names[i], "\n")
    p <-
      prepare_table(
        dfgroups %>% dplyr::filter(group == tab_names[i]),
        timepoint_col,
        item_col,
        value_col,
        history_type = "value"
        ) %>%
        output_table_html(
          item_label = "item",
          history_style = "bar"
        )
      cat(knitr::knit_print(p))
      cat("\n")
}
```


```{r, results = 'asis'}
construct_rmd_tab_group(
  dfgroups,
  timepoint_col,
  item_col,
  value_col,
  tab_col = "group",
  tab_order = c("norm", "sparse"),
  tab_group_name = "tabs func loop",
  tab_group_level = 1,
  history_type = "value",
  item_label = "item",
  history_style = "bar"
)

```
